name: Stripe Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Stripe Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Stripe API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Stripe API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: balance

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

customerId.name: customerId
customerId.description: ID of the customer whose source to delete
customerId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer ID | 作用: ID of the customer whose source to delete | (必填项)

token.name: token
token.natural_language_description: 参数名: Card Token | 作用: Token representing sensitive card information | (必填项)

cardId.name: cardId
cardId.description: ID of the card to remove
cardId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Card ID | 作用: ID of the card to remove | (必填项)

sourceId.name: sourceId
sourceId.description: ID of the source to retrieve
sourceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source ID | 作用: ID of the source to retrieve | (必填项)

amount.name: amount
amount.description: Amount in cents to be collected for this charge, e.g. enter `100` for $1.00
amount.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount | 作用: Amount in cents to be collected for this charge, e.g. enter `100` for $1.00 | 默认值: 0

currency.name: currency
currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code, e.g. `USD` or `EUR`. It must be a Stripe-supported currency. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
currency.natural_language_description: 参数名: Currency Name or ID | 作用: Three-letter ISO currency code, e.g. `USD` or `EUR`. It must be a Stripe-supported currency. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

source.name: source
source.description: ID of the customer's payment source to be charged
source.natural_language_description: 参数名: Source ID | 作用: ID of the customer's payment source to be charged | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: metadata (值: None) - Set of key-value pairs to attach to the source to create
statement_descriptor (值: None) - Arbitrary text to display on the customer's statement

chargeId.name: chargeId
chargeId.description: ID of the charge to update
chargeId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Charge ID | 作用: ID of the charge to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: address (值: None) - Address of the customer to update
description (值: None) - Arbitrary text to describe the customer to create
email (值: None) - Email of the customer to create
metadata (值: None) - Set of key-value pairs to attach to the customer to create
name (值: None) - Full name or business name of the customer to create
phone (值: None) - Telephone number of this customer
shipping (值: None) - Shipping information for the customer

duration.name: duration
duration.description: How long the discount will be in effect
duration.natural_language_description: 参数名: Apply | 作用: How long the discount will be in effect | 默认值: once | (必填项)

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Type of token to create | 默认值: cardToken | (必填项)

amountOff.name: amountOff
amountOff.description: Amount in cents to subtract from an invoice total, e.g. enter `100` for $1.00
amountOff.natural_language_description: 参数名: Amount Off | 作用: Amount in cents to subtract from an invoice total, e.g. enter `100` for $1.00 | 默认值: 0 | (必填项)

percentOff.name: percentOff
percentOff.description: Percentage to apply with the coupon
percentOff.natural_language_description: 参数名: Percent Off | 作用: Percentage to apply with the coupon | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.description: Full name or business name of the customer to create
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Full name or business name of the customer to create | (必填项)

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: email (值: None) - Customer's email to filter by

eventName.name: eventName
eventName.description: The name of the meter event. Corresponds with the event_name field on a meter.
eventName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event Name | 作用: The name of the meter event. Corresponds with the event_name field on a meter. | (必填项)

value.name: value
value.description: The value of the meter event. Must be an integer. Can be positive or negative.
value.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value | 作用: The value of the meter event. Must be an integer. Can be positive or negative. | 默认值: 1 | (必填项)

cvc.name: cvc
cvc.description: Security code printed on the back of the card
cvc.natural_language_description: 参数名: CVC | 作用: Security code printed on the back of the card

expirationMonth.name: expirationMonth
expirationMonth.description: Number of the month when the card will expire
expirationMonth.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expiration Month | 作用: Number of the month when the card will expire

expirationYear.name: expirationYear
expirationYear.description: Year when the card will expire
expirationYear.natural_language_description: 参数名: Expiration Year | 作用: Year when the card will expire
